newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Ringgit extends fall but ends off low vs dollar.
newsitem.headline: Ringgit extends fall but ends off low vs dollar.

text.p: The ringgit extended its fall against the dollar but closed off the day's lows as dollar/majors retreated from earlier highs, dealers said.
"It was fairly quiet in the afternoon with softer dollar/majors helping the ringgit," said a local bank dealer.
They said the market largely shrugged off news of a second U.S. missile attack on Iraq.

"Dollar/ringgit is reacting to market positions rather than news," one dealer with a foreign bank said. He said players were buying back dollar to cover shorts, adding "market position is not favourable for the ringgit at the moment."
